title: Montana Mountain Men: Books 1-3
description: Seven Brothers, seven steamy love stories. This boxset contains the first three books in the Montana Mountain Men Series.Property of the Mountain Man Owned by the Mountain Man Kept by the Mountain Man Over-the-top, jealous, possessive alpha males. Love at first sight. One look is all it takes for these mountain brothers to go from confirmed bachelors to obsessed with the women who were destined to be theirs. But being loved by a Barnett man isn’t always easy… and the path to true love rarely runs smoothly. Hold on tight because it’s time to get caught by a Barnett brother.
author: Gemma Weir
